## âœ… Checklist

**Code Quality:**
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project

- [ ] Community features are not broken
- [ ] Marketplace functionality is intact

- [ ] I have added/updated TypeScript types
- [ ] I have added comments for complex logic

**Security:**

- [ ] User inputs are properly validated
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date

## ğŸ‘€ Reviewer Guidelines

**For reviewers, please check:**

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Functionality works as described
- [ ] No obvious security issues
- [ ] Performance is acceptable
- [ ] Documentation is updated

- [ ] Mobile experience is good
- [ ] Keyboard community needs are met

**Review focus areas:**
- [ ] Code quality and maintainability
- [ ] User experience and accessibility
- [ ] Data accuracy (for data additions)
- [ ] Security considerations
- [ ] Performance implications
